description: A classic central european classic is a quick to cook dinner option.
name: Turkey Schnitzel Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium turkey breasts, cut into 4 equal pieces and flattened

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Crack and beat the eggs into a bowl. In another bowl sift the flour.
In a 3rd bowl mix the panko crumbs with all the herbs and seasoning. Wrap the sliced turkey in cling film and then flatten them all using a tenderiser or meat mallet.
Now place the turkey in the flour and cover fully, then dip into the egg and finally the panko crumb mix.
Place the covered turkey breasts onto a baking tray and bake in the oven for 20 minutes or until the turkey is cooked fully. Remove from the oven and serve with a selection of condiments and sides.
